variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: EXAM
variable.description: FRAMINGHAM EXAM CYCLE 5-6

variable.name: RQ002
variable.description: WHEEZING OR WHISTLING IN CHEST ANY TIME IN LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ003
variable.description: WOKEN UP WITH FEELING OF TIGHTNESS IN CHEST IN LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ004
variable.description: HAD ATTACK OF SHORTNESS OF BREATH DURING DAY WHEN NOT DOING ANYTHING STRENUOUS IN LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ005
variable.description: HAD ATTACK OF SHORTNESS OF BREATH WHICH CAME ON AFTER STOP OF EXCERCISE IN LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ006
variable.description: BEEN AWAKENED AT NIGHT BY AN ATTACK OF SHORTNESS OF BREATH IN LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ007
variable.description: BEEN AWAKENED AT NIGHT BY AN ATTACK OF COUGHING IN LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ008
variable.description: USUALLY COUGH FIRST THING IN THE MORNING

variable.name: RQ009
variable.description: USUALLY BRING UP PHLEGM FROM YOUR CHEST FIRST THING IN THE MORNING

variable.name: RQ010
variable.description: BROUGHT UP PHLEGM FROM YOUR CHEST LIKE THIS ON MOST MORNINGS FOR AT LEAST 3 MONTHS A YEAR

variable.name: RQ011
variable.description: WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST DESCRIBES YOUR BREATHING
variable.value: I GET REPEATED TROUBLE WITH MY BREATHING, BUT IT ALWAYS GETS COMPLETELY BETTER
I NEVER OR ONLY RARELY GET TROUBLE WITH MY BREATHING
MY BREATHING IS NEVER QUITE RIGHT

variable.name: RQ012
variable.description: WHEN NEAR ANIMALS, DUST, FEATHERS, DO YOU EVER GET A FEELING OF TIGHTNESS IN YOUR CHEST

variable.name: RQ013
variable.description: WHEN NEAR ANIMALS, DUST, FEATHERS, DO YOU EVER START TO FEEL SHORT OF BREATH

variable.name: RQ014
variable.description: EVER HAD ASTHMA

variable.name: RQ015
variable.description: HAD AN ATTACK OF ASTHMA AT ANY TIME IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS

variable.name: RQ016
variable.description: CURRENTLY TAKING ANY MEDICINES (INC. INHALERS, AEROSOLS, OR TABLETS) FOR ASTHMA

variable.name: RQ017
variable.description: NOW SMOKE CIGARS OR PIPES

variable.name: RQ018
variable.description: NOW SMOKE CIGARETTES (WITHIN THE LAST WEEK)

variable.name: RQ019
variable.description: EVER SMOKED CIGARETTES FOR AS LONG AS A YEAR (IF YES, ANSWER RQ020-RQ022)

variable.name: RQ020
variable.description: HOW MANY YEARS HAVE YOU SMOKED / DID YOU SMOKE

variable.name: RQ021
variable.description: NUMBER OF CIGARETTES SMOKE(D) A DAY

variable.name: RQ022
variable.description: IF NO LONGER SMOKE, WHEN QUIT

variable.name: RQ023
variable.description: CURRENTLY TAKING ANY STEROID MEDICATIONS

variable.name: RQ024
variable.description: IF TAKING ANY STEROID MEDICATIONS, BY WHAT ROUTE (IF TAKEN BY MORE THAN ONE ROUTE, HIERARCHY OF ROUTES IS INJECTED, ORAL, INHALED, NASAL, SKIN...)
